text: Mr. Hobbs Takes a Vacation is a 1962 American comedy movie directed by Henry Koster and is based on the 1954 novel Mr. Hobbs' Vacation by Edward Streeter. It stars James Stewart, Maureen O'Hara, Fabian, Lauri Peters, Lili Gentle, John Saxon, John McGiver, Marie Wilson, Reginald Gardiner and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 1 Golden Globe in 1963. == Other websites == * * * Category:1962 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Mr. Hobbs Takes a Vacation
